definition: The word "privat" refers to something that is not public or shared with others. It is commonly used to describe personal matters, activities, or spaces that are not open to the general public.

examples.german: Sie möchte ihre privaten Daten schützen.
examples.english: She wants to protect her private data.

examples.german: Er hat eine private Sammlung von Büchern.
examples.english: He has a private collection of books.

examples.german: Wir haben eine private Feier geplant.
examples.english: We have a private celebration planned.
